text: Dror Kashtan (; 1 October 1944 â€“ 15 January 2024) was an Israeli football player and manager. He made three appearances for the Israel national football team in 1962. He also managed the national team from 2006 to 2010. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Israeli footballers Category:Israeli football managers
